001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.time.ZoneId;
005
006import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
007
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig.Provider;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.ConvertParameter;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.KeyParameter;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.PassThroughParameter;
017import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
018import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
019import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
020
021/**
022 * Configures Logback style pattern encoders and offers provision with the URI scheme
023 * {@value PatternEncoder#PATTERN_SCHEME}.
024 */
025@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
026public final class PatternConfigurator implements Configurator {
027
028        /**
029         * For service loader to call.
030         */
031        public PatternConfigurator() {
032                // for service loader.
033        }
034
035        @Override
036        public boolean configure(LogConfig config) {
037                var compiler = compiler(config);
038                config.encoderRegistry().register(PatternEncoder.PATTERN_SCHEME, new PatternEncoderProvider(compiler, config));
039                return true;
040        }
041
042        static PatternCompiler compiler(LogConfig config) {
043                var registry = config.serviceRegistry().putIfAbsent(PatternRegistry.class, () -> PatternRegistry.of());
044                boolean ansiDisable = LogProperty.Property.builder() //
045                        .toBoolean() //
046                        .orElse(false) //
047                        .build(LogProperties.GLOBAL_ANSI_DISABLE_PROPERTY) //
048                        .get(config.properties()) //
049                        .value();
050                var patternConfig = config.serviceRegistry().putIfAbsent(PatternConfig.class, () -> {
051                        var b = PatternConfig.builder().fromProperties(config.properties());
052                        if (ansiDisable) {
053                                b.ansiDisabled(true);
054                        }
055                        return b.build();
056                });
057                var compiler = config.serviceRegistry()
058                        .putIfAbsent(PatternCompiler.class, () -> new Compiler(registry, patternConfig));
059                return compiler;
060        }
061
062        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternEncoderBuilder", prefix = LogProperties.ENCODER_PREFIX)
063        static Provider<LogEncoder> provideEncoder(@KeyParameter String name, String pattern,
064                        @PassThroughParameter @Nullable PatternCompiler patternCompiler) {
065                return (n, config) -> {
066                        var compiler = patternCompiler;
067                        if (compiler == null) {
068                                compiler = PatternConfigurator.compiler(config);
069                        }
070                        return LogEncoder.of(compiler.compile(pattern));
071                };
072        }
073
074        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternConfigBuilder", prefix = PatternConfig.PATTERN_CONFIG_PREFIX)
075        static PatternConfig provideFormatterConfig(@ConvertParameter("convertZoneId") @Nullable ZoneId zoneId,
076                        @Nullable String lineSeparator, @Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled) {
077                PatternConfig dc = PatternConfig.of();
078                ansiDisabled = ansiDisabled == null ? dc.ansiDisabled() : ansiDisabled;
079                lineSeparator = lineSeparator == null ? dc.lineSeparator() : lineSeparator;
080                return new SimpleFormatterConfig(zoneId, lineSeparator, ansiDisabled);
081
082        }
083
084        static ZoneId convertZoneId(@Nullable String zoneId) {
085                var dc = PatternConfig.of();
086                ZoneId zoneId_ = zoneId == null ? dc.zoneId() : ZoneId.of(zoneId);
087                return zoneId_;
088        }
089
090}
091
092record PatternEncoderProvider(PatternCompiler compiler, LogConfig config) implements LogEncoder.EncoderProvider {
093
094        @Override
095        public LogEncoder provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) {
096                PatternEncoderBuilder b = new PatternEncoderBuilder(name);
097                String prefix = b.propertyPrefix();
098                LogProperties combined = LogProperties.of(uri, prefix, properties);
099                b.fromProperties(combined);
100                return b.build().provide(name, config);
101        }
102
103}
